reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

description.narrative: To present success stories, benefits and legal regulation of participation in the development cooperation projects fro responsible public authorities thus increasing support for development assistance at the highest political level. Sharing best practices, benefits and opportunities of participation in the EU and international development cooperation projects to civil servants, representatives of non-governmental and business sector and general public hence building stronger motivation for involvement in the global development initiatives; Preparing proposals on amendments in national legal acts governing international development cooperation activities which would eliminate obstacles and increase involvement of Lithuanian representatives in the EU and international development cooperation programmes; Initiate the dialogue with representatives of the EU partner countries' institutions, presenting them with the results of Lithuania's successfully implemented development assistance projects through the EU Twinning programme and other international development assistance instruments, thereby enhancing notoriety of Lithuania as a reliable development cooperation donor at the EU and international level; Introducing Lithuanian public and private sectors' development cooperation success stories to the EU partner countries and international donors, exchanging best practices.
